tool_description: Determines activity multiplier based on exercise frequency, intensity, working status, and lifestyle factors.

exercise_frequency.description: Daily exercise frequency (none, light, moderate, active, very_active)

exercise_intensity.description: Exercise intensity level (low, moderate, high, very_high)

error_messages: Invalid exercise frequency: Use one of [none, light, moderate, active, very_active]
Exercise duration out of range: Duration must be 0-480 minutes
Invalid exercise intensity: Use one of [low, moderate, high, very_high]
Invalid environment type: Use one of [indoor, outdoor, mixed]
Invalid temperature exposure: Use one of [cold, moderate, warm, hot]
usage: Specify exercise_frequency, exercise_duration_minutes, and exercise_intensity. Add working_animal, indoor_outdoor, and temperature_exposure for more precise activity assessment.

activity_multiplier.description: Multiplier to apply to resting energy requirement
